record.title: TRIBUTE TO COLONEL MICHAEL P. BARBERO
record.narrative:
TRIBUTE TO COLONEL MICHAEL P. BARBERO -- (Senate - April 02, 2008)

[Page: S2314]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I associate myself with the remarks of my counterpart, the majority leader, and congratulate the colonel on his career and thank him so very much for all of his assistance to us over the years.
